column6:
"THE WINDING WAY",2005,11

The startling journey into Nightcrawler's origin continues! While Christine's life hangs in the balance, Kurt must endure one final trial: A battle royal against an enraged Wolverine that echoes the death of Kurt's brother, Stephen! Part 5 (of 5)!

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | colorist:Matt Milla | inker:Jimmy Palmiotti | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Darick Robertson
